blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: Lost in Paradise
description:
by Marcus_Crassus

Age of Sail AU, basically Blue Lagoon with Starklings.

Jon, Arya and Sansa get shipwrecked on a deserted island in the south Pacific, and spend years learning to survive and thrive. Only as they all get into puberty and start dealing with all the hormones and emotions that comes with that….

I enjoy playing with the idea that all 3 have a bit of a thing for each other (the primary pairings are Jon/Arya and Jon/Sansa, but there will be some Arya/Sansa), but all 3 struggle with knowing its supposed to be wrong, but they don’t have any other outlet for what they’re going through.

Definitely going to be on the more sweet and romantic side, but hopefully with some delicious smut in there once we get going. Probably some angst as well, because reasons.

Words: 712, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Underage
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Jon Snow, Arya Stark, Sansa Stark
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark, Jon Snow/Sansa Stark, Jon Snow/Arya Stark/Sansa Stark
  • Additional Tags: First Time, shipwrecked, innocent teenagers, They’re all thirsty for each other, But they all think its weird

blog.name: gendrie
blog.title: fierce and terrible and hers
blog.description:
annalesa / 27 / pisces /
they would not make her yield

summary: If she were highborn, command would come naturally to her, and deference to them. Brienne wondered whether Willow might be more...
body:
If she were highborn, command would come naturally to her, and deference to them. Brienne wondered whether Willow might be more than she appeared.
Brown hair, brown eyes, skinny … could it be? Arya Stark’s hair was brown, she recalled, but Brienne was not sure of the color of her eyes. Brown and brown, was that it? Could it be that she did not die at Saltpans after all?

My lord father is bringing me a Stark girl. Lord Eddard’s daughter, Arya. You remember little Arya, don’t you?“
Arya Underfoot, he almost said. Arya Horseface. Robb’s younger sister, brown-haired, long-faced, skinny as a stick, always dirty.
"I remember her. Arya.”
“She shall be the Lady of Winterfell, and me her lord.”

Arya. Jon straightened. It had to be her. […] She looked enough like Arya to give him pause, but only for a moment. A tall, skinny, coltish girl, all legs and elbows, her brown hair was woven in a thick braid and bound about with strips of leather. She had a long face, a pointy chin, small ears. 

three bastards all rising up through the ranks of society - ramsay is legitimized and made lord of winterfell. jon becomes lord commander of the wall. gendry is a knighted at the hollow hill. 

- and each has a connection to arya. arya served roose during her time in harrenhal but she narrowly escaped their clutches. the boltons then force jeyne poole to pretend she’s arya and marry ramsay so they can claim the north with “arya” as lady of winterfell 

jon and arya were the closest among the stark children. he believes her to be dead until receiving news of arya’s upcoming marriage to the boltons. melisandre tells jon arya is on her way to him on the wall but it turns out to be alys karstark. she resembles arya too and smiles like her in a way that almost breaks jons heart. alys is a lady but she - unconventionally - marries a wildling. 

gendry and arya formed a close bond while traveling through the riverlands together. willow is running the crossroads where gendry lives now. she has a similar temperament and appearance as arya (+ the same age) brienne wonders if the girl could actually be arya and hyle says she will most likely marry gendry who is deeply mourning the loss of the real arya. 

so we have 3 bastards with 3 arya’s and multiple marriage references. thats a pattern.

blog.name: rissa-rey
blog.title: Whatever.
blog.description:
In the beginning the Universe was created.
This has made a lot of people very angry
and been widely regarded as a bad move.
—Douglas Adams

tags: because this has to do with both
summary: There is plenty of dumbfuckery to go around in this fandom without manufactured bullshit.
body:
As a coda to the art theft debate—put up or shut up. If you’re going to claim someone stole something then prove it…if you can’t prove it then shut the fuck up. Art theft, plagiarism, etc are legitimate problems faced by legitimate content creators (unfortunately) all the time and the last thing genuine victims need is some asshole running around making false allegations to try and stir up drama in a ship war that won’t die.

There is plenty of dumbfuckery to go around in this fandom without manufactured bullshit.

Oh and one more thing…

Quote swapping is a normal thing in pretty much every fandom ever—just cause you saw it on someone’s art doesn’t mean they own the quote. If you don’t recognize it then look it up before acting like a bitch ass troll.

blog.name: asongofstarkandtargaryen
blog.title: Dracarys!
blog.description: Jon/Dany/Bran/Arya Stan. Salty about the got ending. Also likes: The 100,  Star Wars, Stranger Things.

summary: Arya Stark is a great character and one that carries a very important message. She is just another girl who grew up a...
body:
Arya Stark is a great character and one that carries a very important message.

She is just another girl who grew up a patriachial society where a woman’s worth is defined by her father, husband and sons’ accomplishments. But she’s also that one little girl who refused to accept that as her fate. As she said to her father “that wouldn’t be her” because Arya had her own ambitious for her future and those included her being acknoledged by her own merits and not because of who she would marry or give birth to.

Thankfully, we don’t live in a medieval society but plenty of us feel suffocated by patriarchy in our countries. Characters like Arya, who refuse to sudmit to the patriarchy and chose their own way on life, empower us and give us hope for the future generation of girls. Despite the fact that she’s so young (she’s only 9 at the beginning of asoiaf) Arya is a great character to look up to and draw strength from.

And that’s why I’m gonna love Arya till the end of time.

blog.name: istulmys
blog.title: The Hound, the Gravedigger and Sandor Clegane.
blog.description: Daily dose of fan art. No Cleganebowl. Personal blog A-muscaria.

summary:
Winter Is Coming

by 
Ertaç Altınöz (Artstation) / 
ertacaltinoz (deviantart)  While the final season of Game of Thrones is fast...
caption:
Winter Is Coming by Ertaç Altınöz (Artstation) / ertacaltinoz (deviantart)

While the final season of Game of Thrones is fast approaching, I couldn’t help myself but imagine and draw a fan art with Arya saving Sandor’s life just like he saved hers at the Twins. I really want to see them on road again, together- definitely to the King’s Landing for a final mission.
If Winterfell is going to fall, if wights and whitewalkers will roam into the castle, please show, let Arya rescue the Hound and set her home on fire before they trick the death one more time!

- Ertaç Altınöz

title: Ink Parchment Quil
description:
by Inks_Prophecy

The Old Gods have been patient. Watching and testing infinite possibilities, but finally have decided to make their move.
Calling on a young crannogman with the great potential, he is summoned to the Isle of Faces to witness what will become the creation of the most important song yet to be sung.

The Song of Ice and Fire.

It is common knowledge that those who do not learn from their mistakes are doomed to repeat them. Keeping this in mind, the gods task this young man with providing many helpful nudges in the right direction, careful not to throw the entire story off balance.

After all, destiny will happen whether you actively work toward it or not. That is why it is destiny.

Words: 18452, Chapters: 9/?, Language: English

  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death, Underage
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, Multi

title: There is only one ship...
body:
…and its name is Jonrya.

“Please, my babies, stay alive!!!”

summary: Hallo Gendrya & Jonrya fans. I am not new to both of those fandoms, because I’m a total trash for this incredible...
caption: Hallo Gendrya & Jonrya fans. I am not new to both of those fandoms, because I’m a total trash for this incredible Baratheon/Stark/Targaryen trio for a long time, now having a chance to be united and ready to kick some asses. I’m sure this season will blow our minds no matter what is going to happen, although I truly count on those two lads with helping Arya find out who she wants to be :) Hopefully fandom will like my lil’ gift as much as I enjoyed making this group portrait. All the love  xoxo

tags: yes I did just invent the medieval fleshlight
it's going to be one of those days
summary: ❛  what is this? is this what i think it is?  ❜
question: ❛  what is this? is this what i think it is?  ❜
answer:
Jaime cracked an eye open to see the small but fierce face of his wife above him. In her hand, she held up a large drinking horn. The very one, in fact, that he had stuffed with a pound of raw steak, a warm towel and some nice, slick massage oil.

He’d meant to dispose of it before she got back to their chambers. Clearly, he’d fallen asleep after using it.

He smiled a rueful smile. Hoping he could charm his way out of her obvious disgust. “Brienne had a headache,” he shrugged.
